## Expected directory structure

```bash
.
├── Simulated Two Photon
│   ├── Sequence1.tif
│   └── Sequence2.tif
│   
├── MUSC (One Photon)
│   ├── Sequence1.h5
│   └── Sequence2.h5
│
├── Microscopy
│   ├── Fluo-C2DL-MSC
│   └── Fluo-N2DH-GOWT1
│
└── LIVEHDR
    └── Noisy Sequence
       |── 1Runner
       |── Booblehead
       └── Bouncyball  

```
